Detailed Description

This class is a static class that is used to setup and manage I/O reactors.

Since the I/O reactor threads are a process-wide resource, the methods of this class are static.

Member Function Documentation

void ReactorFactory::initialize ( uint16_t  reactor_count  )  [static]

This method creates and initializes the I/O reactor threads and must be called once by an application prior to creating the Comm object.

Parameters:
reactor_count number of reactor threads to create

Definition at line 60 of file ReactorFactory.cc.

static void Hypertable::ReactorFactory::get_reactor ( ReactorPtr &  reactor_ptr  )  [inline, static]

This method returns the 'next' reactor.

It returns pointers to reactors in round-robin fashion and is used by the Comm subsystem to evenly distribute descriptors across all of the reactors.
